NK072(nu)005:1: // dpal ldan gsang ba snying po'i khog 'bub sa bcad
NK072(nu)005:2: kyi rim pa nyung ngu 'khor 'das bar gyi lo
NK072(nu)005:5: dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK072(nu)005:6: pad+ma'i skye gnas las 'byung phan bde yi //
NK072(nu)005:7: 'byung gansa dri meda thugs rje'i 'oda zer can //
NK072(nu)005:8: skye rgu'i nyi ma grub dbang rdzogs chen pa //
NK072(nu)005:9: yab sras dbyer med bdag blo'i pad mor rol //
NK072(nu)005:10: zhes mchod par brjod pas mdun bsus te rgyud thams
NK072(nu)005:11: cad kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba rtsa ba'i
NK072(nu)005:12: rgyud 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po lung gi spyi
NK072(nu)005:13: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i
NK072(nu)005:14: rgyud kyi sa bcad cung zad cig 'god par bya
NK072(nu)005:15: ba la / thog mar ji ltar byung ba'i lo rgyus dang /
NK072(nu)005:17: dang po la'ang sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho las /
NK072(nu)005:18: rgyal ba sems dpa' rnal 'byor pa //
NK072(nu)005:19: dgongs pa rig pa rna bar brgyud //
NK072(nu)005:20: gang la thug gi bar du'o //
NK072(nu)005:22: rgyal ba dgongs brda'i brgyud pa /
NK072(nu)005:24: gang zag rna bar brgyud pa sde gsum las /
NK072(nu)005:25: dang po la'ang dgongs brgyud dang brda brgyud gnyis /
NK072(nu)005:26: gnyis pa la rig 'dzin mi ma yin gyi brgyud pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:27: mi dang mi ma yin gnyis ka'i brgyud pa ste gnyis /
NK072(nu)005:28: gsum pa la rgya gar pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:29: bod nas brgyud tshul gnyis rnams yod /
NK072(nu)005:30: gnyis pa rgyud don dngos bshad pa la /
NK072(nu)005:31: bshad bya'i yan lag bstan pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:32: bshad bya dngos bshad pa gnyis las /
NK072(nu)005:33: dang po la bshad bya dam pa'i chos ngos bzung ba dang /
NK072(nu)005:34: 'chad byed kyi chos ngos bzung ba dang /
NK072(nu)005:35: ji ltar 'chad pa'i tshul te gsum du yod pa las /
NK072(nu)005:37: spyir sngags la rgyud sde drug tu yod pa la /
NK072(nu)005:38: 'dir gang bshad par bya ba ni ma h+aa yo ga /
NK072(nu)005:39: de la'ang tan+t+ra sde bco brgyad yod pa las /
NK072(nu)005:41: de la'ang nang gses sgyu 'phrul sde brgyad dang bshad
NK072(nu)005:42: rgyud sde bzhi ste bcu gnyis yod pa'i nang nas
NK072(nu)005:43: rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba nyid de
NK072(nu)005:47: lung dang rig pa man ngag gi //
NK072(nu)005:48: tshad ma dag gis gang gzhal bas //
NK072(nu)005:49: shes bya khong du chud par 'gyur //
NK072(nu)005:50: zhes pa ltar lung rig man ngag gsum gyis 'chad
NK072(nu)005:51: dgos pa'i dang po ni rgyal ba'i bka' lung spyi
NK072(nu)005:52: dang bye brag bshad rgyud sde bzhi'i lung tshad ma'o
NK072(nu)005:53: // gnyis pa man ngag tshad ma ni rgya bod
NK072(nu)005:54: kyi mkhas grub rnams kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa rnams
NK072(nu)005:55: // dang / bla ma dam pa'i zhal gyi gdams pa rnams so //
NK072(nu)005:56: gsum pa rig pa tshad ma ni /
NK072(nu)005:57: de gnyis ka dang rjes su mthun par rang gi blos dpag pa'o //
NK072(nu)005:58: gsum pa ji ltar 'chad pa'i tshul la ma h+aa
NK072(nu)005:59: yo ga spyi'i 'chad tshul rgyan bdun gyi sgo nas
NK072(nu)005:60: 'chad pa dang / zur po che'i phyag bzhes mda'
NK072(nu)005:61: ltar rtse mo nas bzung ste 'chad pa sogs gsum
NK072(nu)005:62: 'chad pa dang / dang / sgro phug pa'i phyag
NK072(nu)005:63: bzhes chos lnga'i sgo nas 'chad pa rnams yin mod
NK072(nu)005:65: bi ma la'i khog gzhung gsal sgron gyi dgongs pa
NK072(nu)005:67: gnyis pa bshad bya dngos bshad pa la /
NK072(nu)005:69: rab la mtshan bstan 'bring la dbye /
NK072(nu)005:72: dang po dbang po rab la rgyud kyi mtshan bstan pa la'ang /
NK072(nu)005:73: rab mtshan tha snyad gsum du grags //
NK072(nu)005:74: zhes pa ltar rgyud dang mthun pa'i mtshan rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba bshad pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:75: lung dang mthun pa'i mtshan 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po lung gi spyi bshad pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:76: man ngag dang mthun pa'i mtshan gsang ba'i snying po
NK072(nu)005:77: de kho na nyid nges par bshad pa ste gsum
NK072(nu)005:78: mo // de dag la nang gses kyi dbye ba'ang mang du yod do //
NK072(nu)005:79: gnyis pa dbang po 'bring la rgyud don rnam par
NK072(nu)005:80: dbye ba la'ang don gyi rnam grangs rnam par dbye
NK072(nu)005:81: ba dang / tshig gi rnam grangs rnam par dbye ba gnyis las /
NK072(nu)005:82: dang po la'ang rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu gleng gzhi /
NK072(nu)005:86: 'khor la gdams shing bstan pa gtad pa ste lnga las /
NK072(nu)005:87: dang po la'ang thun mong ma yin pa'i dang /
NK072(nu)005:88: thun mong gi gleng gzhi gnyis las /
NK072(nu)005:90: phyi grol lam ltar rgyud 'byung ba khyad par gyi gleng gzhi dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:91: nang thabs lam steng sgo dang sbyar te bshad rgyud rgya mtshos bshad pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:92: gsang ba thabs lam 'og sgo dang sbyar te bshad rgyud thal bas bshad pa ste gsum yod /
NK072(nu)005:94: rgyud 'byung ba khyad par gyi gleng gazhi'am longs sku'i gleng gzhi dang gcig /
NK072(nu)005:95: gdul bya dgos ched kyi gleng gazhi'am khro bo'i gleng gzhi dang gnyis /
NK072(nu)005:96: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gleng gazhi'am sprul sku'i gleng gzhi ste gsum yod /
NK072(nu)005:97: de dag re re bzhin phun sum tshogs pa lnga lnga'i bdag nyid can te /
NK072(nu)005:98: de ltar thun min dang thun mong bsdoms pas drug go //
NK072(nu)005:99: gnyis pa rgyud 'byung ba'i rkyen gleng slong la'ang /
NK072(nu)005:100: thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng slong dang /
NK072(nu)005:101: thun mong gi gleng slong gnyis las /
NK072(nu)005:102: dang po la'ang yab kyis thabs kyi cha bzung ste gleng slong ba dang /
NK072(nu)005:103: yum gyis shes rab kyi cha bzung ste gleng slong ba dang /
NK072(nu)005:104: yab yum gnyis med kyis thabs shes dbyer med kyi cha bzung ste gleng slong dang /
NK072(nu)005:106: de las phyi ma la'ang gzhi rang bzhin gyi sems bskyed /
NK072(nu)005:107: bsgrod pa lam gyi sems bskyed /
NK072(nu)005:108: mthar phyin 'bras bu'i sems bskyed dang gsum du sbyar tshul yod /
NK072(nu)005:109: de dag la brten nas 'khor rnams kyis rim bzhin lhag pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:110: lhag pa don dam gyi bden pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:111: lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med rnams rtogs nas ston
NK072(nu)005:112: 'khor dgongs pa dbyer med du gyur te rang don
NK072(nu)005:113: du rgyud zhu ma dgos pa'o //
NK072(nu)005:114: gnyis pa thun mong gi gleng slong la'ang gzhan don du rgyud gsungs par 'khor gyis zhus pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:115: ston pas lan stsal ba gnyis te /
NK072(nu)005:117: gsum pa 'bras bu yongs su shes par bya ba
NK072(nu)005:118: rgyud don dngos la'ang rgyud gsum gyi rnams bzhag spyir
NK072(nu)005:119: bshad pa dang / lam gyi cha rkyen rgyud kyi
NK072(nu)005:120: dngos po bcu bye brag tu bshad pa gnyis las
NK072(nu)005:121: bshad pa dang / / dang po la'ang /
NK072(nu)005:124: 'bras rgyud bshad pa de gsum yod pa'i dang po la'ang /
NK072(nu)005:125: ngo bo'i gzhi dang brtags pa'i gzhi gnyis yod /
NK072(nu)005:127: thabs kyis nges pa'i lam dang /
NK072(nu)005:128: shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis yod /
NK072(nu)005:132: dbye ba gsum gyi ngo bo la sems lnga yod /
NK072(nu)005:133: nges tshig la dpe dpe can gnyis yod /
NK072(nu)005:134: dbye na thabs lam gcig car ba ste 'og sgo'i lam dang /
NK072(nu)005:135: rim gyis pa steng sgo'i lam gnyis yod /
NK072(nu)005:136: gnyis pa grol lam pa la'ang /
NK072(nu)005:137: ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba gsum yod /
NK072(nu)005:138: ngo bo ni sems lnga yin kyang thabs lam dang
NK072(nu)005:139: cung zad mi 'dra ba'i gong 'og 'khrugs sdebs yod
NK072(nu)005:141: dbye na grol lam gcig car ba dang /
NK072(nu)005:143: de gnyis ka'i lam gyi khog mtshan nyid gsum gyis 'bu ba dgos te /
NK072(nu)005:146: 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen //
NK072(nu)005:147: nus mthu can du gang gyur pa //
NK072(nu)005:148: rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags //
NK072(nu)005:150: rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba /
NK072(nu)005:151: rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin /
NK072(nu)005:152: lam gyur gyi 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid rig 'dzin bzhi ste gsum las /
NK072(nu)005:157: 'khor 'das gnyis su zhen pa sgro btags dang bcas pa'o //
NK072(nu)005:162: mngon sum pa'i gtan tshigs te rtogs pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs /
NK072(nu)005:163: snod bcud rgyud gsum dag pa ste dag pa gsum gyi gtan tshigs /
NK072(nu)005:164: thun mong gi mnyam pa gnyis dang lhag pa'i mnyam pa gnyis te mnyam pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs /
NK072(nu)005:165: bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs te gtan tshigs bzhi yod /
NK072(nu)005:167: gtan tshigs de dag gi rim pa ltar lhag pa'i
NK072(nu)005:168: bden pa dbyer med spyod yul dang bral bar gtan
NK072(nu)005:169: la phebs pa ni sngags bla med kyi lta ba'i
NK072(nu)005:170: grub mtha' 'o // gnyis pa rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin la'ang /
NK072(nu)005:171: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK072(nu)005:172: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis yod /
NK072(nu)005:173: de gnyis ka'i lam gyi gzhung shing /
NK072(nu)005:177: phyag rgya spros bcas te zag ldog gnyis ldan tshogs lam gyi rnal 'byor bzhi dang /
NK072(nu)005:178: brag bcas ldog pa med pa sbyor lam gyi rnal
NK072(nu)005:179: 'byor tshom bu tshogs bsgrub ste lnga rer nges pa
NK072(nu)005:180: las / dang po la rig pa spyi blugs su 'jog pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:181: mthong ba'i rjes la 'jog pa ste 'jog thabs gnyis yod /
NK072(nu)005:182: gnyis pa la dmigs bcas dang dmigs med gnyis yod /
NK072(nu)005:183: gsum pa la phra ba yig 'bru la bslab pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:184: rig pa lha sku la bslab pa gnyis yod /
NK072(nu)005:185: bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor spros pa /
NK072(nu)005:188: zhal phyag spros pa dang bzhi yod /
NK072(nu)005:189: de dag la'ang nang gses rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i dbye ba 'ga' zhig kyang yod do //
NK072(nu)005:190: lnga pa tshom bu tshogs sgrub la'ang phun sum tshogs pa lngas gzhi bzung ba dang /
NK072(nu)005:191: bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhis gzhungs bsrangs ba /
NK072(nu)005:192: 'bras bu rig 'dzin 'grub pa'i dus bstan pa ste gsum yod /
NK072(nu)005:193: gsum pa lam gyur gyi 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la'ang /
NK072(nu)005:194: mthong sgom mthar lam gsum gyis bsdus pa'i rig 'dzin rnam pa bzhi las /
NK072(nu)005:195: dang po rnam smin rdos bcas kyi phung po'i sbub
NK072(nu)005:196: nas sems lha'i skur yongs su smin pa rnam smin
NK072(nu)005:197: rig 'dzin dang / rnam smin snyigs ma'i lus kyang
NK072(nu)005:198: dwangs ma'i lus su tshe 'dir bsgyur nus pa tshe
NK072(nu)005:200: 'di gnyis blo'i nus stobs che chung gi khyad ma gtogs sngags kyi mthong lam pa'o //
NK072(nu)005:201: phyag chen rig 'dzin ni sgom lam pa ste /
NK072(nu)005:209: lhun grub rig 'dzin ni mi slob pa'i lam pa ste /
NK072(nu)005:210: rgyu'i theg pa'i kun tu 'od du btags pa de dang tshul gcig pa'o //
NK072(nu)005:211: gsum pa 'bras rgyud la'ang sku lnga /
NK072(nu)005:215: 'phrin las lnga ste 'bras chos nyi shu rtsa lnga yod /
NK072(nu)005:216: don gnyis pa lam gyi cha rkyen rgyud kyi dngos po bcu bye brag tu bshad pa yang /
NK072(nu)005:220: gsang sngags rgyud kyi dbye ba bya //
NK072(nu)005:222: de kho na nyid lta ba /
NK072(nu)005:223: la dor ba spyod pa bkod pa dkyil 'khor /
NK072(nu)005:226: gnas su stobs pa mchod pa /
NK072(nu)005:230: don du gnyer ba bsgrub pa ste bcu yod pa la /
NK072(nu)005:231: de dag re re bzhin ngo bo sogs bcu gcig rer dbye ba'i tshul yod kyang /
NK072(nu)005:233: dbye ba gsum rer dbye ba las /
NK072(nu)005:234: ngo bo dang nges tshig rnams ni 'grel ba las rtogs par bya /
NK072(nu)005:236: dang po lta ba la lam gyi rim pa'i lta grangs dgu dang /
NK072(nu)005:237: nyams su blang bya rgyud kyi lta grangs dgu ste bsdoms pa bco brgyad dang /
NK072(nu)005:238: shes rab kyi tshogs brgyad la sogs pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:239: gzhan yang dbang rabs kyis gong du smos pa'i gtan
NK072(nu)005:240: tshigs rnams la brten nas rtog par bya ba dang
NK072(nu)005:241: / dbang 'bring gis rang bzhin dang 'bras bu'i rtags la brten nas rtogs par bya ba dang /
NK072(nu)005:242: dbang po tha mas thabs nye ring gnyis la brten
NK072(nu)005:243: nas rtogs par bya ba sogs rtogs bya rtogs byed
NK072(nu)005:244: so so'i sgo nas dbye ba du ma yod do
NK072(nu)005:245: // gnyis pa spyod pa la'ang thabs grol thun mong gi spyod pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:246: bye brag so so'i spyod pa gnyis las /
NK072(nu)005:248: las dang po pa'i dus su dge spyoong gzhon nu lta bu'i spyod pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:249: cung zad goms tshe rtogs pa rkyen thub kyi spyod pa smyon pa lta bu dang /
NK072(nu)005:250: shin tu goms tshe rgyal po sa 'dzin gyi spyod pa dang gsum mo //
NK072(nu)005:251: gnyis pa bye brag gi spyod pa la /
NK072(nu)005:252: thabs lam brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:253: grol lam bag yod kyi spyod pa gnyis yod /
NK072(nu)005:254: phyi ma la yang cig car mnyam pa'i spyod pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:255: dad brtson gyi spyod pa sogs rim gyis pa'i spyod pa'i dus grangs bdun yod /
NK072(nu)005:256: gsum pa dkyil 'khor la'ang bcu gcig dang brgyad sogs su dbye tshul yod kyang /
NK072(nu)005:257: 'dir bshad rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas 'chad pa la /
NK072(nu)005:260: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK072(nu)005:262: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK072(nu)005:263: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK072(nu)005:264: tshom bu tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bdun yod /
NK072(nu)005:266: zhi ba la phan dbang bcu /
NK072(nu)005:267: khro bo la phan dbang bco brgyad /
NK072(nu)005:268: gnyis ka la nus dbang lnga dang /
NK072(nu)005:273: gsang ba zab mo'i dbang ste gsum du 'du /
NK072(nu)005:274: de las zab dbang gsum so sor dbye na lngar 'gyur /
NK072(nu)005:275: de las kyang phan nus gnyis bum dbang du bsdus
NK072(nu)005:276: nas gcig tu bgrang tshe dbang bzhir 'du ba yin
NK072(nu)005:277: no // lnga pa dam tshig la'ang bla na med
NK072(nu)005:278: pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi spangs ba sogs rtsa
NK072(nu)005:280: dug lnga mi spang bar lam du 'khyer ba dang /
NK072(nu)005:281: bdud rtsi lnga mi 'dor bsten pa ste yan lag gi dam tshig bcu /
NK072(nu)005:282: de las dbye ba'i sum brgya drug cu la sogs pa'o //
NK072(nu)005:283: drug pa mchod pa la'ang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pas mchod pa gnyis sam /
NK072(nu)005:284: bye brag gi mchod pa bcu bzhi la sogs pa'o //
NK072(nu)005:288: gsang ba sbyor sgrol zab mo'i mchod pa ste gsum du 'adu'o //
NK072(nu)005:289: bdun pa 'ching zlos sngags dang phyag rgya la 'ching ba phyag rgya dang /
NK072(nu)005:292: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK072(nu)005:295: phyag rgya chen po ste bzhi'o //
NK072(nu)005:296: yang na de la dbye ba'i phyag rgya bdun no //
NK072(nu)005:298: rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya dang /
NK072(nu)005:300: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste gsum gyi khongs su 'adu'o //
NK072(nu)005:301: gnyis pa sngags la'ang bzla bya sngags kyi sgo nas dbye ba dang /
NK072(nu)005:302: bzlas pa sgo'i sgo nas dbye ba gnyis las /
NK072(nu)005:306: de dag la ngo bo dang /
NK072(nu)005:308: rtags kyi sgo nas dbye ba so sor yod do //
NK072(nu)005:309: gnyis pa la rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags thugs srog gi sa bon h+aum lta bu dang /
NK072(nu)005:310: bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags lha rang rang gi mtshan sngags dang /
NK072(nu)005:311: de gnyis sbrel ba bzlas pa las kyi sngags te gsum mo //
NK072(nu)005:312: brgyad pa ting nge 'dzin la bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka
NK072(nu)005:313: dang rjes su mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis so
NK072(nu)005:314: // dgu pa phrin las la zhi rgyas dbang drag
NK072(nu)005:315: ste las bzhi'i steng mchog gi las bsnan pas lnga'am
NK072(nu)005:316: // / mchog gi las la nang gses bzhir dbye bas brgyad du 'gyur ba rnams so //
NK072(nu)005:317: de dag thabs gang gi sgo nas byed pa yang /
NK072(nu)005:318: ho ma ste sbyin sreg gi sgo nas las byed pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:319: rdzas kyi sgo nas las byed pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:320: lu gu rgyud de bro'i sgo nas las byed pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:321: mchod rten te mnan pa'i sgo nas las byed pa rnams so //
NK072(nu)005:322: bcu pa bsgrub pa la'ang thun mong gi sgrub pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:323: mchog gi sgrub pa gnyis las /
NK072(nu)005:324: dang po la'ang mang du yod kyang 'dir rtsa rgyud dngos kyis bstan pa /
NK072(nu)005:325: yon tan 'byung ba'i dngos grub drug /
NK072(nu)005:327: las phran tsheg brgyad la sogs pa'o //
NK072(nu)005:328: mchog gi sgrub pa ni rig 'dzin gyi go 'phang gang zhig don du gnyer ba'o //
NK072(nu)005:329: de dag kyang rang rang gi sgrub thabs rnams dang
NK072(nu)005:330: khyad par rgyud 'di'i dgongs pa tshom bu tshogs sgrub
NK072(nu)005:332: de dag gi 'bras bu yong shes rgyud don rdzogs nas /
NK072(nu)005:333: gzhung gi sa bcad bzhi pa rgyud kyi dgos 'grel ni /
NK072(nu)005:334: gzhi rgyud kyi don lta bu brjod bya /
NK072(nu)005:335: lam rkyen yi ge'i rgyud lta bu rjod byed /
NK072(nu)005:336: de la brten nas lam rgyud dngos bskyed rdzogs rim gnyis kyi don rtogs pa lta bu dgos pa /
NK072(nu)005:337: de bsgoms pa'i mthus mthar thug sangs rgyas thob pa lta bu nyid dgos te /
NK072(nu)005:338: des na brjod bya dang rjod byed shes bya dang shes byed du 'brel /
NK072(nu)005:339: rjod byed dang dgos pa thabs las thabs byung du 'brel /
NK072(nu)005:340: dgos pa dang nying dgos de las de byung du 'brel /
NK072(nu)005:341: nying dgos dang brjod bya ngo bo bdag gcig gis 'brel ba ste /
NK072(nu)005:343: sa bcad lnga pa 'khor la gdams shing bstan pa
NK072(nu)005:344: gtad pa la'ang gdams pa dang gtad pa gnyis las
NK072(nu)005:345: / dang po la'ang gzhi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rtogs byar gdams pa /
NK072(nu)005:346: gdul bya lam gyi snang ba bgrod byar gdams pa /
NK072(nu)005:347: log rtogs 'khrul ba'i snang ba dag byar gdams pa /
NK072(nu)005:348: 'bras bu bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba thob byar gdams pa ste bzhi yod /
NK072(nu)005:350: dang po bka'i bsdu ba po gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje la gtad pa /
NK072(nu)005:351: bar du ma mo dang mkha' 'gro la gtad pa /
NK072(nu)005:352: tha ma ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag chos mig can rnams la gtan pa ste gsum mo //
NK072(nu)005:353: 'di dag kyang gzhung tshig gang dang gang gis ston pa dang /
NK072(nu)005:354: khog 'bub tshul gyi lung sogs kyang yi ge mang
NK072(nu)005:355: du dogs nas ma bkod pa nyid las rang bzo
NK072(nu)005:356: byas pa ni ma yin te /
NK072(nu)005:357: bka' sde zur ba'i bshad srol gtso bor bzungs nas
NK072(nu)005:358: bi ma la'i man ngag gis kyang zur brgyan te
NK072(nu)005:359: bshad rgyud kyi dgongs pa 'khrul med bkod pa yin
NK072(nu)005:360: no // spyi don gnyis pa tshig gi rnam grangs rnam par dbye ba ni /
NK072(nu)005:361: lam rkyen yi ge'i rgyud ji ltar grub tshul smros pa ste /
NK072(nu)005:362: de yang dkar lta bu yi ge /
NK072(nu)005:363: yi ge du ma tshogs pas don gyi ngo bo tsam ston pa dkar po lta bu ming /
NK072(nu)005:364: ming du ma 'dus par sa dkar po zhes pa
NK072(nu)005:365: lta bu don gyi khyad par ston pa dag ni
NK072(nu)005:366: tshig / tshig des don dngos su ston pa ras
NK072(nu)005:367: dkar po'i lwa ba gyon na shin tu mdzes lta
NK072(nu)005:368: tshig / bu ste / des na yi ge 'dus pa las ming /
NK072(nu)005:370: tshig 'dus pa las don gyi rnam grangs ston pa'i
NK072(nu)005:371: tshigs bcad lhug dang le'u dang glegs bam gyi bar
NK072(nu)005:373: gsum pa dbang po ma thar 'bru gnyer bkrol ba
NK072(nu)005:374: la'ang rtsa rgyud le'u nyer gnyis kyi don gyi ma
NK072(nu)005:375: lus pa mthar chags su 'bru 'grel byas nas 'chad
NK072(nu)005:376: pa ste 'grel gzhung bzhin shes par bya'o //
NK072(nu)005:377: de lta bu'i 'brel zhing rgyun ma chad pa'i rgyud
NK072(nu)005:378: gang la dbye na tshig dang don gyi sgo nas
NK072(nu)005:380: tshig gi sgo nas dbye ba sgrar snang ba'i rgyu /
NK072(nu)005:382: brdar gyur pa'i rgyud dang gsum /
NK072(nu)005:383: don gyi sgo nas dbye ba gzhi lam 'bras bu'i rgyud gsum ste drug go //
NK072(nu)005:384: lta ba dang spyod pa'i sgo nas dbye na /
NK072(nu)005:385: lta ba gtso bor ston pa rnal 'byor rgyud dang /
NK072(nu)005:386: spyod pa gtso bor ston pa bya ba'i rgyud gnyis /
NK072(nu)005:387: snga ma la dngos dang rnal 'byor bla med kyi rgyud gnyis /
NK072(nu)005:388: phyi ma la'ang dngos dang cha mthun gyi rgyud dam spyod rgyud gnyis te bzhi /
NK072(nu)005:389: de la bla med la pha rgyud ma rgyud gnyis
NK072(nu)005:390: med kyi rgyud sde gsum du dbye bas drug go
NK072(nu)005:391: // rtsa ba dang yan lag gi sgo nas dbye na /
NK072(nu)005:395: rtogs pa'i rgyud de bzhir 'gyur ro //
NK072(nu)005:396: des na thams cad bsdoms pas rgyud kyi dbye ba bcu drug go //
NK072(nu)005:397: de las kyang rgyud kyi dbye ba dngos ni gzhi
NK072(nu)005:398: lam 'bras gsum yin la gzhan rnams ni lam rkyen
NK072(nu)005:399: yi ge'i rgyud kyi dbye ba'o //
NK072(nu)005:401: sna tshogs bshad pa'i rgyu skar ni //
NK072(nu)005:402: shes bya'i mkha' la chas pa'i tshe //
NK072(nu)005:403: phyogs lhung sems kyis rang rang gzhung //
NK072(nu)005:404: mun sel sgron ma yin par rlom //
NK072(nu)005:405: de tshe legs bshad 'od brgya pa //
NK072(nu)005:406: rnying bstan shar ri'i rtser slebs pas //
NK072(nu)005:407: phar cher bag nyal gyur to zhes //
NK072(nu)005:408: gtam 'di kho bos ma bsgrags sam //
NK072(nu)005:409: byis pa gang zhig bum mkha' mthong nas de las nam mkha' gzhan med ces /
NK072(nu)005:410: rtogs 'di bsal phyir skye bo mkhas pas nam mkha'i mtshan nyid rab brjod pas /
NK072(nu)005:411: de yi de tshul rtogs des rang nyid gyi nar gyur zhes brjod pa ltar /
NK072(nu)005:412: theg pa dman mchog nyid dang de 'dzin skyes bu'ang de bzhin mkhyen 'tshal lo //
NK072(nu)005:413: 'di brtsam dge ba bla med ni //
NK072(nu)005:414: lam rgyud blang dor byed phyir min //
NK072(nu)005:415: gzhi rgyud gang zhig mngon gyur pa'i //
NK072(nu)005:416: rgyud de kho nar bsngo bar bgyi //
NK072(nu)005:417: de mthus gzhi la gnas pa'i ye shes ni //
NK072(nu)005:418: log rtog 'khrul pa'i sems dang dgrar gyur nas //
NK072(nu)005:419: 'gro kun gzhon nu bum sku'i khang bzang du //
NK072(nu)005:420: btsan sa zin pa'i dbugs 'byin 'thob par shog /
NK072(nu)005:421: ces dpal ldan gsang ba snying po'i khog 'bub sa bcad kyi rim pa nyung ngu 'di yang /
NK072(nu)005:422: skyabs mgon thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs sras bu chen /
NK072(nu)005:423: rang nyid kyi rdo rje'i mched po rig pa 'dzin
NK072(nu)005:424: pa bud+d+ha pha la nas 'di lta bu zhig dgos
NK072(nu)005:425: zhes bskul ngor / grub dbang rdzogs chen pa yab
NK072(nu)005:426: sras kyi bka' 'bang gi gral mthar sdod pa po
NK072(nu)005:427: rgyal ba'i sras po gzhan phan mtha' yas 'od zer
NK072(nu)005:428: du 'bod pas blo thog nas ja bar zhig la
